OpenIndy User Documentation

Open source software solution for industrial measurement (metrology, laser tracker, quality control)

Facebook Github

OpenIndy User Documentation

Overview  Preperation  Different Views  Measurement  Other Functionalities  

Getting started

This user documentation shows the functionalities of OpenIndy and the way it works. To show this, we have one special measurement task and will describe all steps to solve it. It is described in detail in the “measurement” section

The guide is structured in the following sections:

Preperation

This section describes all steps you have to do for preparing your OpenIndy software, before you can solve the task.

Different Views

All the different views with its functionality on the data are described in this section. views

Measurement

All neccessary steps for solving the task are described in detail in this section. It also shows all the settings you have to do for this job.

Other Functionalities

Some functionalities you do not need for solving this special task, but maybe for others, are described in the “other functionalities” section.
